name: Old Quarry
description:
What dark and twisted things are happening in the wild?

With the arrival of the protagonist, the answer gradually surfaced!



Game plot:

You will control the protagonist to a mysterious field, and uncover the unknown terrible secret here!

Content and game play

-Search for weapons hidden in every corner of the map

-Fighting the mutant zombies

-Rich decryption elements

-Complete props and weapon system

-Explore the vast map

Game features:

-First person real and exciting game mode.

-The tense and terrifying atmosphere of the game.

-Learn the terrible truth in the wild
